Description: 2017 Epiphone Les Paul Standard ProHere is a very cool Epiphone Les Paul Standard Pro with a nice Cherry Sunburst flame top! The serial number dates it to 2017 and the actual weight is 8 lbs 12 oz.The body is very clean overall with no dings or scratches. There are some light streaks visible in the light, but nothing out of the ordinary for a lightly used guitar. No cracks, modifications or structural issues.The neck is straight and the frets show only light wear. It's in excellent playing condition with no dead frets or other major issues. The fretboard, back of the neck and headstock are clean with no dings or worn areas. No cracks, repairs or extra holes.The hardware and electronics are original and in excellent working condition. It comes in a Gator hardshell case which has some general wear on the outside. All of the latches, hinges and handle are in excellent working order and the interior has no bad odors.Please note that I do not set up my guitars before mailing. I have played it and everything is great as far as I'm concerned, but you may need to change the strings, adjust the action or do other maintenece to get it to your preferences. I list some of my items on both eBay and Reverb. In the event that this item sells on both marketplaces before I can take the other listing down, I will honor the first sale and refund the second. There will be no exceptions to this! SHIPPING & PAYMENT The shipping cost quoted in the shipping calculator is based on an estimated weight. It may actually be less when I processs the shipping label and I will refund any overcharge beyond postage and packaging costs. I only accept PayPal for my listings. Payment must be received within 10 Days after I send the invoice. I generally mail items within 2-3 days after payment. Please let me know if you have won some items and plan to bid on others so that I will wait to send the invoice. Local pickup is available. INTERNATIONAL BUYERSSorry, but international shipping is not available for this item
